website_summaries.verdict: Pure tea tree oil with similar quality to higher-priced competitors and a lot of happy customers make Sun Organics the best choice if you want to save money.
pros: Garners praise for the value – a large 4-ounce
Users have also raved about the results it produces for a wide variety of uses
cons: The consistency is a bit oily

customer_reviews.title: NOT TEA TREE OIL!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awful! It smells NOTHING like tea tree oil. As other reviewers have stated, it smells exactly like Pine Sol. I never write reviews, but this is so terrible that I felt I needed to warn others.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Lister

customer_reviews.title: Not 💯 % Tea Tree Oil. Listen to your instincts. Has a very oily filler added to it.
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely not 💯 % Tea Tree Oil There is a def filler added to it that overpowers the tea tree oil smell. 3/3 Still a one. Seller contacted me, assured me it was 100% tea tree oil. Offered to send a replacement. Unfortunate exactly as the first. Very little tea tree oil smell. Smells like pine sol. Very oily. Not like any tea tree oil I've ever purchased, will stick with another brand. Have purchased several dif tea tree oils that were all equally great in quality. Same smell, just like it should. Def something off about this brand. Appreciate replacement but still will not use. Do not trust it. 😐 sorry.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.

customer_reviews.title: Pine Sol - beware
customer_reviews.text: This is not tea tree oil. Not pure at least. Perhaps counterfeit? But someone dumped pine sol in a bottle and labeled it as a pure essential oil. I posted a photo of my blot test on white paper. It's very greasy. I would ask for a refund if I had any idea of how to safely ship this back. I make my own cleaners to avoid any toxins, and ironically now my house and my hands smell like pine sol.
customer_reviews.author: Momma_of_4

customer_reviews.title: No scent
customer_reviews.text: I got this just to put in a cold mist humidifier or water spritzer. In no way expected to get 4oz of legit EO for <$7. People, this is FAR cheaper than other brands fur a reason. My issue with Good Night was it had almost no smell at all. I poured more than 4x's the amount of my other brand's lavender and still didn't smell anything. When you smell it right from the bottle, it's like musky, old lavender but nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Posie

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I knew what was in this bottle...it's not tea tree oil. I've been buying tea tree oil for years (used multiple brands)...this is not it. Tea tree oil has a very distinctive smell - this stuff is not even remotely similar. It honestly smells exactly like Pine Sol. Furthermore, I inadvertently got some on my lip and my lips went completely numb. Disturbing. I questioned myself when looking at my options on Amazon when I needed to replenish my stash at how much you for for your dollar....now I know why. It's not pure. I'm not convinced there's ANY tea tree oil in the bottle, period.
customer_reviews.author: TRB

customer_reviews.title: NO PINE SOL, people are dramatic
customer_reviews.text: I have eczema & my skin is EXTREMELY sensitive to anything that is not natural. I’ve used this oil alone, specifically in one target area so I’d know if it was not natural, I’d know right away. I’ve always experimented this way because if it’s not my skin will little break out like wild fire in 1-2 days. Again, it’s been exactly one month & absolutely no issues nor break outs. Do not believe the crap you read on here. People will say anything instead of just leaving an opinion..
customer_reviews.author: Denequa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Athletes foot-worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Skeptical about herbal remedies. Followed the recommendations: apply twice a day for 1 month. Excellent results. Also used for skin rashes (cat allergy) instead of 1% hydrocortisone, just as effective. Trying monthly regime for skin blemish had for ages: progressing satisfactorily. The plastic pipette included is very useful, especially for athletes foot. However, being of a very cheap construction, it does not last through a 4 oz bottle. Excellent replacements are available on Amazon (moveland 100Pcs 3ml Pipettes Plastic Transfer Pipettes Eye Dropper, Essential Oils Pipettes Dropper Makeup Tool for $6 - 6 cents a piece)
customer_reviews.author: Ogilvie

customer_reviews.title: Possibly synthetic
customer_reviews.text: And this was OK but it did not work to heal my skin as I’m accustomed. Tea Toil usually works swiftly on any type of skin sore, and this was very slow to work. The oil was very much chemical smelling, not the traditional tea tree oil aroma. While I can’t prove that it was synthetic, they would certainly have to prove to me that it is pure Tea tree oil. Suffice it to say, you get what you pay for. I will go back to paying $30 for 1/2 an ounce because I know those brands are selling the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: makesense

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure if this is really Tea Tree Oil
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this as a "cheaper" option to what is available locally at the Vitamin Shoppe. This stuff smells like Pine Sol, and not in a good way. I'm using Tea Tree oil topically to treat razor bumps acne, and skin tags. The aroma of this stuff leaves me smelling like I just finished working the floors of someones kitchen. :( The bottle is very plain looking and I'm not fully assured this is100% authentic. I would buck up and pay a little more on another product and skip on this. I'll update if I notice any difference for my topical applications. UPDATE: I could not tolerate the smell of this product and threw it out 3 days post review
customer_reviews.author: Rico Tals

customer_reviews.title: Works great for acne
customer_reviews.text: My son's back is covered in acne. The poor kid can't sleep on it at night without popping something. The medicine the doctor gave us was pricey, so we decided to try this. It's working great. His back looks so much better. Of course he's got scarring, so it's still red, but the zits are minimal now. It does cause drying and itching from the dry skin, so we moisturize after applying.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle A Yates

customer_reviews.title: no smell but nice customer service
customer_reviews.text: Update- I did return this product and got a refund. The seller did email me also to try to make things right. I also purchased the lemon oil it was disappointing also but I couldn't return it. The seller did offer to refund/replace the lemon. Not good product but the seller is nice at least. Smells weird when first opened tried it in my diffuser 2 times and never could smell anything past opening the bottle. Pointless waste of money returning
customer_reviews.author: Kauai Kittens RescueTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Free!
customer_reviews.text: I use Tea Tree oil almost every day because mixed with Castle soap and water it becomes a non toxic disinfectant. I have an area in my home that has wood floors with puppy pads because my dog uses that area sometimes so I mop the floor in that area every day with this mixture. This way I'm not using toxic chemicals. I have recently switched ALL of my cleaning products and personal use products to "natural, chemical free" solutions and this was perfect for my changes. The less chemicals I am exposed to in the house and on my body the better. I highly recommend this as a disinfectant product. I'll be purchasing more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Drummer girl

customer_reviews.title: I usually buy my tea tree oil from a drug ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy my tea tree oil from a drug store or my local Trader Joe's at $10/ fl oz. When I saw this 4 oz bottle for the same price, I knew I had to get it. I got the bottle and a pipette in a box. I removed the plastic film and unscrewed the lid expecting to smell the strong scent, but was only able to get a small whiff out of it. I thought nothing of it until I used the pipette to apply to my skin. It felt very oily and was definitely NOT THE REAL DEAL. It seems to be infused with other oils.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product has changed, this is garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Sun oils for years. Always understood they were far less expensive than other brands and took the good with the not so good. These last bottles I've bought from them came with a tinfoil seal instead of the plastic stoppers previously used. They also have almost NO scent. And have the viscosity of olive or canola oil, theyre not essential oils. Whatever they cut the oils with has changed and it's much more diluted. I've given this company hundreds of dollars over the past years, but they won't get another dime. This product is trash.
customer_reviews.author: David Simione

customer_reviews.title: NOT AN EFFECTIVE FLEA REPELLENT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a natural FLEA REPELLENT. I've used cheap stuff from Wal Mart that worked wayyy better than this. I few small drops worked. This stuff I have been POURING ON and does NOTHING!!! This stuff is 100% COMPLETELY INEFFECTIVE FOR FLEA CONTROL!!! On top of that is does not SMELL as good as the Walmart brand. Now I find out it is NON-RETURNABLE so it's useless. I think the old adage, you get what you pay for applies here.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Brock

customer_reviews.title: Not Pure Tre Tree
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for pure Tea Tree oil, this products is not one I recommend. I keep tea tree because it has so many medicinal properties. It’s a natural go to do acne, scars, skin problems, etc. I tried to try something less expensive. This product seems to be diluted with an carrier oil. I do not think it’ll have the same effect because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Janae White

customer_reviews.title: Foul Smelling
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many different types of Tea Tree oil before and none of them were this offensive. This product made me gag if I was anywhere near it. I can't imagine what the manufacturer could have done to it to get such a nasty scent. Their other essential oils don't smell bad but in my view, this is horrendous. I had to throw the entire bottle away and reorder a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: ITS NOT REAL TEA TREE OIL
customer_reviews.text: So before I bought this, I of course read the reviews. Amongst all the stellar reviews were a few that had one thing in common: they all said this was not real tea tree oil. It smelled different and wasn't effective. I decided not to listen to these people and to try it for myself--they were right. This smells very different from real tea tree oil. When you put it on your face (I used it for acne) it doesn't do anything. When you use real tea tree oil you're supposed to feel your acne tingle. It then tightens your face somewhat. Bottom line: I wasted my hard earned money on a scam.
customer_reviews.author: Yardie Lady

customer_reviews.title: Natures cure
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for treating fungus son toes- Better than pharmaceuticals and natural. Helps for a healthy cuticle and nails growth. Also great for colds and congestion rubbed in chest and temples- use on my children and even my dog when she gets allergies. Rub small amounts around ears an on dogs chest. Vet was amazed it helped her . It' has a strong smell, sorry for personal use, I use at bedtime and it has time to work and soak in.
customer_reviews.author: melonie

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the more expensive oils
customer_reviews.text: I've been using tea tree oil for too many years to count and have tried several different brands ranging from very expensive to moderately priced. This one is fantastic and at such a great price. It's not mixed with a carrier oil in lack for better words to water it down from what I can tell it's 100% pure tea tree oil. I'll be purchasing all my EO's from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: SeanaC

customer_reviews.title: Tea Tree Oil to Promote Nail Growth After Chemo
customer_reviews.text: With the reccomendation of my dermatologist, I am using this on my toe nails which I lost to chemo. They are growing back, but some are looking really damaged, so I asked what I could use to promote growth and revitalize as they grow back in. I have been using pure fractionated coconut oil, whic worked will on my fingers and hair. But the toe nails just look so much worse it's humiliating. I'll check back in after a few months to letyou know if the Tea Tree oil is causing impoved results.
customer_reviews.author: jumpannejump

customer_reviews.title: Packaging concerns.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product however it spilled in the box after I opened it. I transferred a bit into a smaller bottle for easier use. I stored the remainder back on the original box and secured the lid. I pieced it this evening to revile my smaller bottle and the entire content of the original packing spilled in the box. I’m livid right now. I have no more product in less than a months time from my original purchase. I’m more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Reesie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like the smell
customer_reviews.text: I received my oil today and it has a strong pine sol smell. When I clicked to return it I got the message that it could not be returned. The bad part is that I purchased 2 bottles. I refuse to use anything on my body smelling like a cleaning product. I guess you live and you learn. Next time I will read the reviews before I purchase anything.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: I pretty much think oils are oils
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much think oils are oils, so I like this because it's affordable and not ridiculously overpriced like most oils. I purchased this to use in some DIY housecleaning supplies and it's fine and dandy! The only think I don't like is that it comes with that weird cheapo separate plastic dropper instead of a glass or hard plastic dropper that goes inside the lid. You have to store it separate from the bottle, oils don't clean off of things easily, so you'll need to store it wrapped up or in a baggie, and it's almost impossible to actually see how many ML you are using. But the oil certainly gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Christie

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I use tea tree oil on my face each evening before bed. For me this works well to reduce acne. I also occasionally massage it through my hair for strength and healthy scalp. Tea tree oil in general has a strong smell, though this brand is not not bad. To me it has a "fresh, clean" odor. To apply it I pour the oil in a reusable spray bottle that has a fine mist, and this brand does not clog the sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J Tillman

customer_reviews.title: I love this oil
customer_reviews.text: I have used tea tree oil for approximately one year. I have natural hair and I am very careful of what I put on it. I use natural products on my hair so I DIY my conditioner so I know what is in it. Tea tree oil is one of the ingredients, I also add it to my water bottle to spritz my hair each night (I have high porosity hair). The only reason I did not rate this a five star is because of the dropper that was included. After the third use of the dropper, it split at the seam and thus became useless.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tea tree oil as an ingredient in making hand sanitizer. The product arrived promptly and blended well with the other components (witch hazel, lavender oil, aloe vera. It does have a strong fragrance as expected, but the lavender oil cut that smell. Tea Tree oil is medicinal; I'm pleased that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: bksdelightme

customer_reviews.title: Watered Down
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Tea Tree Oil several weeks ago but just now opened it to realize that there was a small hole already in the foil that covers the mouth of the bottle. I opened the hole more and it doesn't smell like Tea Tree Oil at all, it does not have a Tea Tree Oil scent, and. After putting some on my hand I also realized that it's been completely watered down to the point that it's not even oil anymore. :-( do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Iovanna Williams

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan
customer_reviews.text: I have used tea tree oil in my body washes and shampoo for a long time, and my normal supplier is no longer selling it. Thank goodness, too, or I'd never have found this one. I appreciate the amount for the price, I love the quality (it's higher), and I am grateful for the thoughtful bottle and packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Maj

customer_reviews.title: No dropper, but I'll probably buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This product does smell different than other "tea tree oil" that I have used, but after using it, I think that's just because it's more concentrated than I've gotten before. Once it's diluted a bit, it smells just like other oils I've used. 🤷‍♀️ There is no dropper included with the/my 4 oz bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Smells like pine cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Bottle arrived safely to my home but when I opened it, the seal had been punched through with what looks like the end of a small butter knife. It smells exactly like pine cleaner. I will not be using this oil nor will I purchase from this supplier again.
customer_reviews.author: Scruffy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Olive Oil with a splash of essential oil
customer_reviews.text: This smells and feels like low-grade olive oil mixed with a little bit of tea tree oil. I purchased Tea Tree Oil, Lavender Oil, and Cedarwood Oil. All three smell exactly alike except for a hint of the oil on the label. The cedarwood definitelt has more than just a hint due to the car it is pungent by nature. Nevertheless, I know the smell because I will sometimes use olive oil and tea teee oil together to moisturize my dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Reading to Exercise My Little Brain

customer_reviews.title: Smell, Smellier, Smelliest
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried this on my body yet because the odor is so strong. I might try it on my toe nail as long as I can put on double socks and a shoe to cover it but then I'd have to toss the socks. Tried transferring this from the original bottle to another with an eye dropper type dispenser and spilled a little on a plastic table cloth. The tea oil actually warped the clear plastic table cloth and penetrated to the cloth underneath. For now I've sealed the product in two extra ply plastic zip lock bags and those are in a foil bag until I decide what to do with the stuff.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Acid!!
customer_reviews.text: Says 100% natural, but everything around my oil diffuser got sticky, I was confused why. Today I went to lift up a cup I had some pre mixed water and oil in to pour into my diffuser and the bottom had fell out because the oil ate at the plastic, which ruined one of the diffusers I had. Now my second diffuser is not working right.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the amount and super fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Even Trader Joe's can't beat this value -- have bought this brand of other oils before and have been pleased. This bottle does not smell quite as strong as some other brands I've bought in past, but I'm very satisfied. My only suggestion would be to include a screw-in dropper; a lightweight plastic pipette is included, but that's not super useful to me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lessing

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for size and quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying to tell myself I buy something I better make it worth it. The reviews on this product said it was the best option for the price, quality and size and I entirely agree. It’s great tea tree oil and just as comparable to other kinds I’ve had. I wish it came with a dropper but only because I’m lazy, with the large bottle I totally understand why there isn’t one :)
customer_reviews.author: Haley W

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed!!! I ONLY purchase Sun Essential Oil Lenongrass. However, decided to try their Tea Tree, bad mistake & an insult to authentic tea tree oil! The brand I ordered in the past from Amazon (First Botany) will now be my forever brand. Assumed I wouldn't be disappointed b/c of my commitment on repeatedly purchasing their lemongrass for its authentic priorities. Nonetheless, nothing good to say about the Tea Tree. Huge difference when comparing the two.
customer_reviews.author: A.P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: MY ORIGINAL REVIEW: seems oilier than other tea tree oils i've gotten before... i use it to mix with soapy water and disinfect my makeup brushes, but this brand seems to leave an oily residue on my makeup brushes afterward. UPDATED REVIEW: After seeing my above original review, Sun Essential Oils contacted me to state that this shouldn't have been the case, and that they suspected I had a bad batch so they were sending me a replacement. They were right, the replacement is as expected so I will go back to using this to disinfect my makeup brushes. Very happy with their customer service and this replacement product!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Good then Bad
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product before with no issue. There was something off with the last one I purchased. I thought I smelled burned wires or burned rubber in my laundry room. I inspected but found nothing. Then I took a big whiff out of the bottle and there was the culprit. I had already used the product for a number of washes so I don't feel right returning it. But I probably won't buy this brand of Tea Tree EO again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Variety of uses
customer_reviews.text: It's great for a variety of things. I put some in a spray bottle and spray the sofa and other furniture that my cats like to scratch. They don't like the smell and stay away, and the oil doesn't stain the fabric. Update: I read some of the reviews that said this is great for allergies. My husband suffers from allergies all year long. He's used the traditional pills and sprays but they don't last long. He tried the tea tree oil in the spray bottle and found that it worked great for getting rid of his runny nose and itchy eyes. Plus it helped clear up a scalp rash he had. Many kudos for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. McReynolds

customer_reviews.title: Very weak, seems to be diluted in unnamed carrier oil
customer_reviews.text: This can't possibly be pure tea tree oil as advertised. I have used many brands of tea tree oil. This has the right smell but it is very weak. It seems to be diluted in a carrier oil, but I don't want to use it on my skin if I don't know what it is. It doesn't feel like pure tea tree oil either, it feels like a carrier oil.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% Tea Tree Oil
customer_reviews.text: This oil is either extremely diluted or is a chemical replicate. I use tea tree oil quite often and my original seller is not currently available. But I will not be purchasing this again, nor will I be using this because I am not quite sure what it is. Also, the dropper that it comes with is a super thin and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: DLW

customer_reviews.title: Was a great product, but now...
customer_reviews.text: The first bottle I bought was great. It was a glass bottle and you could tell the oil was a good concentration. The new bottle I ordered is plastic and has virtually no scent. Oil seems like it was cut by 90% baby oil or something.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: ...you call this a D R O P P E R?
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine BUT the ‘dropper’ that came inside the box is ridiculous! To make the dropper fit inside the box, it had to be designed bent in several places and the top of the dropper is made of stiff plastic (not rubber) which makes pulling the liquid into the dropper tubing very difficult.
customer_reviews.author: sunni

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because tea tree oil has both anti viral and anti bacterial properties. It's also better for your skin than all that alcohol and works great for mosquitoes. Soaks right in and doesnt irritate your skin.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it seemed like a good bargain. It may be cheaper, but it's certainly a "bargain brand". I make my own laundry detergent, and I add tea tree oil for its antiseptic qualities. I usually only need to add a few drops to the whole batch. I added half the bottle of this, -and it was barely noticeable. Not sure if it was old, or watered down in some other carrier oil, or what, but I will never be buying this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Super Brit

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: The product is not Tea Tree oil!! It is gasoline mixed with possibly a bit of Tea Tree Oil!! It smells horrible and made me sick!! No wonder they don't offer returns/refunds because they know well they are cheating people with the product!! Horrible experience and product!! Don't buy it - don't waste your money. Don't give this company the pleasure of cheating your out of your money for a products that is not what they state and that you you will have to throw away or get sick trying to use it!! It's a a shame they use Amazon to lure in people to buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Big size compared to other brands.
customer_reviews.text: Sent this to my daughter who works in a day care. They had a small lice outbreak. She put a few drops into her and her brothers shampoo before returning to work. No chance of them getting lice now with the tea tree oil. The are using it every time they shampoo. Great size for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Spradling

customer_reviews.title: Weaker than the tea tree oil in the tiny bottles
customer_reviews.text: Not as strong as the stuff you get in the tiny .5oz bottles for the same money. I got this because it seemed like a good value...but it is not nearly as concentrated. Might work for your use...just not as strong as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: The Tommasinis

customer_reviews.title: Pinesol smells better than this
customer_reviews.text: This isn't tee tree oil. It has an eye-watering putrid ammonia smell. I just looked at the ratings, but I should have read the reviews. Some people likened the smell to Pinesol, but that isn't entirely accurate - Pinesol smells better than this. I'm not sure how they thought they could pass whatever chemical concoction this is off as tea tree oil, but you would have to literally have never used tea tree before, or have no sense of smell to believe that this is tea tree oil.
customer_reviews.author: Flint

customer_reviews.title: Am I buying water?
customer_reviews.text: This is great if you are looking for a watered down product. I was under the impression it was 100% tea tree oil (as advertised) but it definitely is not. I have purchased this brand before and loved it so when I ran out I bought it again. When it arrived the packaging looked exactly the same but when I opened it there was hardly any scent. Tea tree oil normally has a very strong aroma. I now have to order more but it won't be the same brand that's for certain.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Hardly any fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I have used tea tree essential oil before from other brands. I use tea tree on a regular basis for my oil diffuser and candle making lately. This oil performed poorly in terms of intensity, longevity. Although the price is cheaper but the product didn't deliver what it was supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Nnm

customer_reviews.title: Keeps away the bugs!!
customer_reviews.text: Literally the only thing that keeps mosquitos away from me! I have O Type blood and apparently they love that type! lol It's also great to put on my fur babies' hot spots and to keep them from licking too much when they're bored!! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: amjb0815

customer_reviews.title: Great healing agent
customer_reviews.text: I contracted some kind of rash on my lips that I could get ride of. It was very painful and caused scaring. Not sure if it was caused from makeup of lip gloss ... none the less it was there. I started using this oil and within days the rash was gone ! So glad I ordered it. (note: I had the oil before the skin rash )
customer_reviews.author: Little Mama

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not good quality like Young Living it it smells good. Seams to be more diluted and the scent doesn’t last long. I also tried to use this for cleaning and to get the old smell out of a wooden trunk and it did not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY-NOT TEA TREE OIL...AWFUL...HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: What the hell is in this bottle!!!??! I've been using tea tree oil for over ten years from multiple companies and it's never smelled like this! Horrible chemical-like smell with a very, very, slight, faint smell of tea tree oil. I usually get a 1oz botttle for the price of this 4oz bottle and now I know why...this isn't the real stuff. This is the first time I've ordered from this company and if they would sell this crap, I definitely will never order anything else by them. Initially, I tried to return it in the app but it said not returnable so I did a 'chat' with customer service and they credited my account..thank god.
customer_reviews.author: TamaraHH

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I contracted nail fungus on one of my toes and was horrified. After reading all the good reviews I decided to try it. I applied it to all of my toes for good measure but noticed a dramatic change after only one day. I will say I cleaned my toenail well and buffed it with an emory board first that I threw away after use. Then I applied the drops about 6 times a day. After only 3 days my toenail looks as good and healthy as new.
customer_reviews.author: CRose

customer_reviews.title: Love This Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff truly is potent! I mixed it with some of my homemade acne treatments and it really did help to tone down and clear up any spots that I may have had. A little definitely goes a long way! Be warned, though: the stuff is so potent that it has a pretty powerful smell. Maybe it is common sense, but I surely wasn't prepared for the strong stringent aroma that met my nostrils the first time I opened the bottle. I absolutely love the product itself, though! I am looking forward to using it in other ways, such as for cleaning products. I would definitely order from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Scent almost non existent. Pathetic excuse for essential oil.
customer_reviews.text: Does putting this into a plastic bottle mess with the scent? The scent is VERY faint. I have small 1oz glass bottles of tea tree oil that put out a stronger scent than this one! Pathetic.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not a good idea
customer_reviews.text: It came in a plastic container- essential oils are supposed to be in glass. I knew it was bogus when I opened it up and it had no scent at all. When I used it in a diffuser, it clogged it up. This was a scam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Might not be as strong as pure essential oil
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice, but I'm not convinced this is pure based on how it seems diluted compared to other brands. My wife refuses to use it and I trust her nose.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Pleake

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not high quality tea tree oil. It's way ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not high quality tea tree oil. It's way to oily to be 100% tea tree. If you use tto often, you know it's almost a dry oil. This is not the case with this product. Also does not have strong astringent-like smell of pure tto. Unfortunately had to return it and made a trip to local health food store
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: This brand of oils is the worst ever. I ordered several different oils made by them, and every single one smelled terrible. These are NOT quality essential oils. They were so bad, we had to just throw them in the trash along with several glass pipettes that we didn’t want to risk trying to clean and cross contaminate the other good oils we have. Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: coopsyd

customer_reviews.title: Awful product
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what is in this bottle, but it's not tea tree oil! I use t.t. oil regularly & it is very strong both in scent & when you apply it to your skin. Even by putting my nose right to the top of the bottle I could not detect any scent (normally all you need to do is open the bottle & it immediately permeates the air). It is low in cost for a reason and I wouldn't even use it if it were free! I gave one star only because it will not allow you to submit zero stars~
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly, bad batch or chemical switch?
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure at first dye to the low price/ounce. I use tea tree oil frequently and really appreciated the larger size. After reading many reviews I purchased. Item arrived quickly & was packed decently. However, I was quickly let down. Upon opening I notice the scent was not like any tea tree or variation I had ever used. I thought perhaps the plastic bottle had caused a problem. The scent was familiar, but I couldn't place it... until I came across a can of wood stain. The scent was identical. Needless to say, I returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Fasel

customer_reviews.title: Quantity vs Price vs Quality are equal!
customer_reviews.text: I appreciated the email from the seller making sure that I was satisfied with the product. I am happy with the quantity and price provided, and the oil appears to be as good as more expensive varieties. I use it to make vaginal suppositories along with coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for mixing mosquito repellent
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for mixing mosquito repellent. I usually buy Radha brand for topical use. I think this may be too strong for my skin so I try to mix it with other carrier oil.
customer_reviews.author: Cleph

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much what you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: Not as strong as I was expecting. The bottle is in good condition and it comes in a leak proof plastic bag with a pipet. I am trying to use it for natural remedies so it would be nice if it were a bit stronger but it's perfectly fine the way it is. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Doran-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Second Time Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this product and will be doing so again in the future. The bottle lasted me well over a year so it's a wonderful investment, I add drops of the oil into homemade facial masks and spot treatment for acne. Works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Vex V

customer_reviews.title: Not sure this is tea tree
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure that this is tea tree oil. It is listed as 100% Pure but I have purchased tea tree oil from a number of different sources in stores and online and it is always the same (in different packaging.) This doesn't smell right and seems thicker, it has an almost diesel like smell. I am using it, but am concerned that the benefits will not be achieved. May end up tossing this bottle if that is the case.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent skin care ingredient
customer_reviews.text: Tea Tree Oil is therapeutic for skin. Anti aging, smoothing, moisturizing and healing. Massage into clean, moist, warm skin. I pour a small amount into my face/body creams & lotions. Should have a lid with an attached dropper, not a separate thin squeeze plastic tube.
customer_reviews.author: patricia h.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price for the quality
customer_reviews.text: We had priced the Tea Tree Oil at various locations locally from Whole Foods and other stores and for the size and quality this was by far the best deal plus delivered to our door.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Adair

customer_reviews.title: its tea tree oil ( i think)
customer_reviews.text: the bottle comes with a plastic eyedropper which i dont really like because it is external to the bottle when not in use and well how are you really going to keep it clean but that is a packaging issue not the product itself... seeing as i am not a chemist i cannot verify any claims of purity or the like... what i am left with is it smells nice (like tea tree oil) and it is performing the way i expect it to... the shipping was as promised and the shipping packing was adequate.... overall my expectations were met
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: The scent is good, my first tea tree oil.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it mainly for the scent because of mosquitoes. Right now there are no mosquitoes so I do not know if this will work. The price was great and it comes with a dispenser so it makes it very easy to dispense.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Madera

customer_reviews.title: No scent
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd bottle I’ve gotten and absolutely loved the first 2 - this bottle seems like it’s just a carrier oil - I love tea tree oil for that strong scent & there’s none to this bottle. Hoping it was just a bad batch - loved this for my bath products I make.
customer_reviews.author: se

customer_reviews.title: So Many Uses!!!🙌🏾
customer_reviews.text: I am IN LOVE w/this oil...granted, this is my 1st foray into essential oils (EO). I 💙 the aroma & the feel on my skin. I mixed this tea tree oil w/grape seed oil (carrier oil; CO) & put it in a roll on bottle to apply to my body to treat insect bites. I am excited to read about & try the MANY uses of tea tree oil. BTW, this was packaged nicely; no leaks & includes a plastic dropper which is useful! Love, KDYLINDATM 💋
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn’s Hacks

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is absolutely awful.
customer_reviews.text: I'd just like to say that this is NOT pure tea tree oil, but seems to have been diluted with something else. It smells acetone to me, it isn't effective when applied, and has a very thin consistency unlike more expensive tea tree oils I've purchased in the past. My advice would be to spend a little more on a quality oil, rather than cut corners and purchase this mess.
customer_reviews.author: bayernrose

customer_reviews.title: I should have read the reviews. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Zero across the board. I purchased this to add to my hair oils and will not be using it. I currently have tea tree oil from Now, that I use two to three drops of per day on my face and add in my hair. The Sun Essentials brand smells like gasoline so I all not be putting in on my hair, let alone my face. Guess I’ll add it to my household cleaners and use to clean the inside of my toilet with.
customer_reviews.author: svd

customer_reviews.title: Very oily texture, good enough for keeping bugs away
customer_reviews.text: I specifically purchased this to combine with water and alcohol in order to make a very natural insect repellent. I do believe it works based on what I've seen over the past few months. However it's extremelyo oily and texture so you do need to be careful of where you're spraying it. As for other more serious use is related to clothing or skin, I have not attempted it for any other use. If I were to use it on my skin, I would get an organic, designated for such use tea tree oil
customer_reviews.author: Deepika Jain

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely kills dandruff
customer_reviews.text: It’s antifungal so after washing hair and towel dry, I put a little on fingertips and rub all through scalp. Husband hates !!smell but it goes away in a couple of hours. And the payoff. For 4 days no itching or that awful smell I don’t know if I had dandruff or not. No flakes or visible. Just regular and I wash on 4th day anyway
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: No Go For Me
customer_reviews.text: I did not care for this brand at all. I usually use Now EO and will go back to that brand again. The Sun EO did not seem to be as strong. I have had several cases of cellulitis and I use the tea tree daily as a preventative measure. I mix the tea tree with water and spray it on after I shower. Usually I get that tingly feeling but I did not get anything with this brand. I also bought the Lemon oil and it did not have as strong of a smell and did not last as long as other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Brown

customer_reviews.title: Competitively priced
customer_reviews.text: It smelled strongly of petroleum and I did not expect this. Tea tree products I have smelt before do not have a petroleum smell. I will use it for a few different things and maybe comment further.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Howes

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I normally pay this price for 1 ounce! So this isa great deal for me. However I don't use TeaTree Oil to so often, so I expect to have it for a very long time. In that respect a smaller bottle might have been better. Time will tell if it is as good as other brands. I like the added dropper that comes with it though. That's a first for me.
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Use it for making my homemade hand/spray sanitizer. Also great for all sorts of infections. Acne, bug bites, cuts so many great uses. Thx
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Cruzado

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware: Not Tea Tree Oil
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give zero stars. I use tea tree oil for literally everything and decided to try this brand based off of reviews. I should’ve stuck to what I normally buy because this stuff is far from tea tree oil. The smell is extremely strange and the color is cloudy. Almost like whatever they concocted up and sent me went bad. I’m not pleased and unfortunately I can’t return it or get a refund so I just wasted my money. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: grace murray

customer_reviews.title: Low percentage Tea Tree Oil high percentage other essential Oils
customer_reviews.text: Low percentage Tea Tree Oil high percentage other essential Oils, there's no way this is 100% tea tree. I got this to add to shampoo but the bottle says it's for aromatherapy only... disappointing. And when i fianlly added it to the shampoo it's not the same as other oils. Get essential oil that is 100% tea tree, not 100% "essential oils".
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor Fan

customer_reviews.title: Not Disappointing at All :-)
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE! They replaced both the oils I got free of charge even though it was months later! What outstanding customer service! I am quite pleased! They said I may have just received a bad batch... Most places don't care about their customers so it's really great to see that. I can now add these oils to my lotions and shampoos This isn't anywhere near as strong as the tea tree oil I've been using. The price Was reasonable however the quality was severely lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Pat and Kai

customer_reviews.title: Not pure
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't seem to be pure however the label states otherwise. My husband uses this for a chonic skin condition and suffered heavy flare ups because this isn't a pure product. Unfortunately he gets bad scars from flare ups so that just makes it worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S

customer_reviews.title: DONT GET IT
customer_reviews.text: I have bought so many essential oils in the past I've lost count but this is by far the worst essential oil I have ever used in my life. It doesn't smell like tea tree oil at all it literally feels like some cooking oil. The FDA mandates that all essential oils must have a minimum of 5% pure essential oil this company absolutely cut the bare minimum. Honestly you're just buying a $10 bottle of canola oil because that's exactly what it smells like
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Not pure tea tree oil
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive a dropper like advertised, but I didn't mind as long as the product was quality... however, upon sniff-testing, this product smells like lemon-lime. Definitely not something you expect with "pure" tea tree. In the past, if I used tea tree, it would sting a little and would leave me smelling it the rest of the day/night, and my trash can would smell heavily like it from disposing tips or cotton swabs. Not so with this product. Also, it's an oil, but it was incredibly and noticeably oily.... not what I ordered, so I will be returning it. I wish I had read reviews before purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: No tea tree smell whatsoever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given no stars if I could have submitted this review without giving any. I ordered this Sun Tea Tree Oil because Amazon rated it as the best but – it doesn't smell like tea tree oil, it is awfully greasy and it is in a plastic bottle! Natural oils are supposed to be in glass containers not plastic! I am returning it and incensed that I have to wait three days to receive another brand. I needed this urgently.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Wiped out toe fungus in a month.
customer_reviews.text: I can't even believe my eyes. I had beautiful feet until a nasty little fungus got on my toe. This oil combined with Vicks vapor rub completely wiped out the fungus. In a month. It says online not to expect any results for a while and not completely healed for a year. Not so with your tea tree oil. Thank you so much. I can wear my sandals again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother to buy!
customer_reviews.text: I know it was a problem when I seen it was in a dark plastic bottle! The first bottle I ordered was great! This second one is mostly extra virgin olive oil with a small amount of tea tree oil! Not even enough to be effective on a big bite! I’m very disappointed and will not be buying from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: soso

customer_reviews.title: ... in fact it is so watered down it is useless as tea tree oil
customer_reviews.text: This Sun Essential Tea tree oil is not 100% pure in fact it is so watered down it is useless as tea tree oil. I have order from this company before this tea tree in fact and had no complaints so I know what I am talking about. SHAME ON YOU SUN ESSENTIAL FOR MAKING UNFOUNDED CLAIMS!
customer_reviews.author: Janette Bradham

customer_reviews.title: Great itch reliever.
customer_reviews.text: Great temporary relief for extremely itchy skin due to bugs or mites. Very strong odor of tea and turpentine though! Will buy again despite the smell! 😁🚿
customer_reviews.author: Tim Barringer ☜ 𝁅

customer_reviews.title: For Aromatherapy Use Only
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t opened it to right a proper review. I’m disappointed because I purchased to treat skin issues. The label says it’s intended use is for aromatherapy and oil burning. AND this item is not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: The best eye dropper I have recieved
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful, it has a very pleasant scent, think citrus meets disinfectant, it absorbs quickly and doesn't just sit on top of the skin. I was worried when I saw the eye dropper wasn't attached, but after receiving a few oils with built in droppers that would only fill 1/4 of the way, I was excited to see this one filled all the way up. Wonderful product and great packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what this is, but I don't think it is pure tea tree oil. It smells bad (I have always enjoyed the smell of tea tree) and it is not nearly as strong or pungent as it should be. I wanted to return it but now I see that it is ineligible for return...I guess I know why. I don't even like leaving negative reviews but as the company will not help me my only choice is to try to keep others from wasting their money like I did.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Hansford

customer_reviews.title: Not like any essential oil
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why this has such great reviews. The Sun Essentials tea tree smells nothing at all like any tea tree oil I've purchased over the past decade. It smells like commercial cleaner, not like tea tree essential oil. It's completely disgusting. Compared to NOW brand or Plant Therapy, I wouldn't even classify it as essential oil. I don't want to use it in my laundry, definitely not on my family's skin, and am even hesitant to use it in my homemade floor cleaner. Maybe it will keep the deer away from my baby trees. This stuff is really not good for much else.
customer_reviews.author: anspaugh

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: This oil does not seem to be as strong as other tea tree oils I've been using for skin fungus control. It doesn't smell as strong, doesn't tingle on my skin and doesn't seem to get the same results as the product I've been using. Both products say 100% tea tree oil but sadly, there is a noticeable difference. Ordered this because of the money saving 4 oz. size but very disappointing. Will not use in the future. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. C.

product_meta.title: Tea Tree Essential Oil (Huge 4oz Bottle) Bulk Tea Tree Oil - 4 Ounce
feature_bullets: GET BETTER RESULTS WITH SUN ESSENTIAL OILS - With what we believe to be superior sourced and harvested ingredients, we think you will agree that our oils are by far the most effective on the market - a wonderful smell that can't be beat!

SUN PROVIDES THE BEST ESSENTIAL OILS - Yes, it's a matter of opinion, but we believe our oils to be the best and will provide anyone who doesn't feel the same way with an 100% pure, unconditional manufacturer refund, anytime. We think you will feel that you have never smelled an oil this wonderful...and that after you have smelled this oil other brands may have a distinct alcohol or chemical smell with a 'dry' scent and noticeable lack of depth.

LOVE THE SMELL AND FEEL GREAT - Fatigue and irritability are often a result of many factors that are difficult to pinpoint. Clear your mind and relax with the wonderful smell of Tea Tree (Melaleuca alternifolia)
SUN makes the BEST quality PREMIUM Oils

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
